class_notes: Additional Prereq of 107. Please reach out to Ale Perozo Borges (alejandra.perozo@emory.edu) with your 7 Digit ID for a permission number. This class has a $125 fee for equipment room access. You will also be in 498R for 1 credit for collection. Enrollment in 498R is required for 255.
course_description: This course focuses on film and other art-based mediums to explore the function and role media in social change movements and its role in addressing social issues. Students will move between the classroom and working in creative teams to develop a short documentary film or photographic exhibit.
prerequisites: (FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101) and (FILM 107 or FILM_OX 107) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3642, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: L. Asherman, Status: Open
